content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Alamo Square to Russian Hill: 13.
Alamo Square to Presidio: 18.
Alamo Square to Chinatown: 16.
Alamo Square to Sunset District: 16.
Alamo Square to The Castro: 8.
Alamo Square to Embarcadero: 17.
Alamo Square to Golden Gate Park: 9.
Russian Hill to Alamo Square: 15.
Russian Hill to Presidio: 14.
Russian Hill to Chinatown: 9.
Russian Hill to Sunset District: 23.
Russian Hill to The Castro: 21.
Russian Hill to Embarcadero: 8.
Russian Hill to Golden Gate Park: 21.
Presidio to Alamo Square: 18.
Presidio to Russian Hill: 14.
Presidio to Chinatown: 21.
Presidio to Sunset District: 15.
Presidio to The Castro: 21.
Presidio to Embarcadero: 20.
Presidio to Golden Gate Park: 12.
Chinatown to Alamo Square: 17.
Chinatown to Russian Hill: 7.
Chinatown to Presidio: 19.
Chinatown to Sunset District: 29.
Chinatown to The Castro: 22.
Chinatown to Embarcadero: 5.
Chinatown to Golden Gate Park: 23.
Sunset District to Alamo Square: 17.
Sunset District to Russian Hill: 24.
Sunset District to Presidio: 16.
Sunset District to Chinatown: 30.
Sunset District to The Castro: 17.
Sunset District to Embarcadero: 31.
Sunset District to Golden Gate Park: 11.
The Castro to Alamo Square: 8.
The Castro to Russian Hill: 18.
The Castro to Presidio: 20.
The Castro to Chinatown: 20.
The Castro to Sunset District: 17.
The Castro to Embarcadero: 22.
The Castro to Golden Gate Park: 11.
Embarcadero to Alamo Square: 19.
Embarcadero to Russian Hill: 8.
Embarcadero to Presidio: 20.
Embarcadero to Chinatown: 7.
Embarcadero to Sunset District: 30.
Embarcadero to The Castro: 25.
Embarcadero to Golden Gate Park: 25.
Golden Gate Park to Alamo Square: 10.
Golden Gate Park to Russian Hill: 19.
Golden Gate Park to Presidio: 11.
Golden Gate Park to Chinatown: 23.
Golden Gate Park to Sunset District: 10.
Golden Gate Park to The Castro: 13.
Golden Gate Park to Embarcadero: 25.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Alamo Square at 9:00AM. Emily will be at Russian Hill from 12:15PM to 2:15PM. You'd like to meet Emily for a minimum of 105 minutes. Mark will be at Presidio from 2:45PM to 7:30PM. You'd like to meet Mark for a minimum of 60 minutes. Deborah will be at Chinatown from 7:30AM to 3:30PM. You'd like to meet Deborah for a minimum of 45 minutes. Margaret will be at Sunset District from 9:30PM to 10:30PM. You'd like to meet Margaret for a minimum of 60 minutes. George will be at The Castro from 7:30AM to 2:15PM. You'd like to meet George for a minimum of 60 minutes. Andrew will be at Embarcadero from 8:15PM to 10:00PM. You'd like to meet Andrew for a minimum of 75 minutes. Steven will be at Golden Gate Park from 11:15AM to 9:15PM. You'd like to meet Steven for a minimum of 105 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"meetings": [{"day": "<DAY>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}

SOLUTION:  
The optimal schedule allows meeting six friends: George, Deborah, Emily, Mark, Steven, and Andrew, while respecting all constraints and minimum meeting durations. The schedule accounts for travel times between locations, starting from Alamo Square at 9:00 AM. Margaret cannot be met due to a time conflict with Andrew, as travel times make it impossible to meet both within their availability windows while satisfying minimum durations.  

The meeting schedule in JSON format is as follows:  

{"meetings": [{"day": "Today", "start_time": "9:08AM", "end_time": "10:08AM"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "10:28AM", "end_time": "11:13AM"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "12:15PM", "end_time": "2:00PM"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "2:45PM", "end_time": "3:45PM"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "3:57PM", "end_time": "7:50PM"}, {"day": "Today", "start_time": "8:15PM", "end_time": "9:30PM"}]}  

This schedule meets:  
- George at The Castro for 60 minutes.  
- Deborah at Chinatown for 45 minutes.  
- Emily at Russian Hill for 105 minutes.  
- Mark at Presidio for 60 minutes.  
- Steven at Golden Gate Park for 233 minutes (exceeding the minimum 105 minutes).  
- Andrew at Embarcadero for 75 minutes.  

Margaret at Sunset District is not met due to the conflict with Andrew. The schedule maximizes the number of friends met (six out of seven) while adhering to all constraints.
